definition: a framework of hexagonal cells resembling the honeycomb built by bees, make full of cavities, like a honeycomb
details:
noun
- a framework of hexagonal cells resembling the honeycomb built by bees
- a structure of small hexagonal cells constructed from beeswax by bees and used to store honey and larvae
verb
- make full of cavities, like a honeycomb
- penetrate thoroughly and into every part
= example: penetrate thoroughly and into every part
- carve a honeycomb pattern into
= example: carve a honeycomb pattern into
